verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1980>"Go<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> [who] is <S%H157>loved<s%> by [her] <S%H7453>husband,<s%> yet an <S%H5003>adulteress,<s%> even as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> though they <S%H6437>turn<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H809>raisin<s%> <S%H6025><s%> <S%H809>cakes.<s%>"
So I <S%H3739>bought<s%> her for myself for <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> [shekels] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and a <S%H9149>homer<s%> and a <S%H3963>half<s%> of <S%H8184>barley.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to her, "You shall <S%H3427>stay<s%> with me for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> You shall not <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H376>man;<s%> so I will <S%H1571>also<s%> be <S%H413>toward<s%> you."

For the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H3427>remain<s%> for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> or <S%H8269>prince,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> or [sacred] <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H646>ephod<s%> or <S%H8655>household<s%> <S%H8655>idols.<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> their <S%H4428>king;<s%> and they will <S%H6342>come<s%> <S%H6342>trembling<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and to His <S%H2898>goodness<s%> in the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
